Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Panoramic Lanka with Total Holiday Options Panoramic Lanka with Total Holiday Options Sri Lanka Private escorted - Panoramic Lanka with Total Holiday Options &vert; 12 Nights • Transfers • Meals as specified (drinks are not included) Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Panoramic Lanka Private escorted tour lets you explore this superb destination, visiting the ancient cities and UNESCO World Heritage Sites of Anuradhapura, Polonnaruwa, Sigiriya and Dambulla. This splendid itinerary includes some easy trekking and nature safaris and offers an excellent all-around introduction to Sri Lanka. View more View less 12 nights + transfers, meals & more from $ 4817 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 4pm on 30 Jan 26 or until sold out Deal Includes: Transfers as specified 12 nights in 4 star deluxe accommodation Transfer, travel and sightseeing by Private air-condition car with an English speaking chauffeur guide Entry fees and monument charges Meals as specified (drinks are not included) Catamaran ride Hiriwadunna village visit Bullock cart ride Jeep safari at Yala and Minneriya National Park Kandy cultural show Tea & Spice plantation visit Bottled water while travelling All current collectable taxes Travel Dates & Pricing From $4817 per person share twin. Travel 01 May-30 Jun & 01-30 Sep 26 Flights are additional Ask us about other travel dates. Itinerary Day 1: Arrive Colombo On arrival at the airport, meet your Chauffeur Guide at the arrival lounge who will assist with the transfer to the hotel for overnight stay. Day 2: Colombo – Yala Travel through the beautiful coastal route to Yala. Evening free to relax. Stay two nights in Yala. (B, D) Day 3: Wildlife Safari An early start to enjoy Safari at the Yala National Park to spot many wild animals, including leopards, reptiles, elephants, and birds. (B, D) Day 4: Ceylon Tea Gardens Leave for Nuwara Eliya, known as ‘Little England’ of Sri Lanka. Afternoon visit Tea Plantation and factory to observe the process of turning green leaf into the finished tea. Stay overnight in a hotel. (B, D) Day 5: Nuwara Eliya – Kandy Travel to Kandy, evening explore famous Royal Botanical Gardens of Peradeniya. Stay two nights in Kandy (B, D) Day 6: Kandy Today enjoy a city tour and visit the Temple of the Tooth Relic, the Royal Botanic Gardens, Gem Museum and in the evening, witness a traditional Kandyan dance. (B, D) Day 7: Spices & Cave Travel to Trincomalee stop en-route at Spice Plantation and Dambulla Cave temple. Stay two nights at Trincomalee. (B, D) Day 8: Trincomalee A day at leisure at the beach resort. (B, D) Day 9: Sigiriya & Village Morning visit Sigiriya rock fortress and afternoon rural village of Hiriwadunna. Enjoy a walk alongside the lake, catamaran to reach a farmhouse for a cup of local tea and a bullock cart ride through paddy fields. Stay three nights in Dambulla. (B, D) Day 10: Polonnaruwa & Wildlife In the morning visit Polonnaruwa, the medieval capital of Sri Lanka. Afternoon takes a jeep safari through spectacular Minneriya National Park. (B, D) Day 11: Anuradhapura Excursion Enjoy an excursion to Anuradhapura an ancient mighty Sinhalese Kingdom and explore the ruins which are a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Afternoon free to relax. (B, D) Day 12: Dambulla – Colombo Travel to Colombo and we do the city sightseeing tour by Tuk Tuk as locals do. Visiting iconic sights, bazaars, churches and temples. Stay overnight in Colombo. (B, D) Day 13: Colombo Departure Enjoy leisurely breakfast. Tour finish with a direct transfer to Colombo international airport. (B) Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings only until 30 Jan 26 or until sold out. Advertised prices are correct as 02 Sep 25 but may vary due to exchange fluctuations or for unforeseen circumstances until paid in full. • Prices are subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing & accommodation restrictions apply • Twin share is based on 2 adults sharing a room. Bedding configurations may vary. • Any credits or meals that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash. Where meals are included, this is food only, beverages are an extra cost. • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Domestic & International flights are additional and not included. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
